days.stoic_quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
days.bro_translation: Small Reps, Big Gains in plain speak: do the simple thing that moves you forward today. Day 1: no excuses, just reps.
days.todays_challenge: Write for 5 minutes on how you applied 'Small Reps, Big Gains' today. List one action you can take tomorrow.
days.todays_intention: Today I will act with intention on small reps, big gains.
evening_reflection_prompts: What tested your patience or resolve today?
Where did you waste time, money, or energy?
What small win are you proud of?

days.stoic_quote: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
